decision_conditions: 2.  The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with drawing number 0002 Rev. 1 of Planning Permission Ref: 31260/APP/2022/3605 dated 15-02-23 and the submitted plans, drawing numbers 0127, 0128, 0129, 0275, 0276, 0277 and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012), Part 2 (2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, which is incorporated in the above revised approved plans condition, all other approved plans and conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 31260/APP/2022/3605 dated 15-02-23 must be discharged/adhered to as per the planning permission.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 31260/APP/2022/3605, dated 15-02-2023 (Erection of a porch, single storey rear extension and the conversion of roof space to habitable use including a rear dormer, 2 front and 2 side rooflights. Rear fenestration changes.) to update fenestrations on existing plans, resize side window, insert 1no. roof light and 1no. door and ramp to side
